---
title: "Dial Test (Hip)"
---

The *Dial Test* is used to detect injury to the hip joint capsule associated with hip instability

# Similar Tests

The dial test is similar to the [log-roll test]({{< var ref-log-roll-hip-test.path >}})

# Technique

- Supine
- Hip and knee in 0&deg; extension
- Maximally internally rotate the hip @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
- The limb is released, allowing the hip to externally rotate to its resting position @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
- Measure the degree of external rotation

ER &gt;45&deg; *without* a firm end-feel is considered a positive test @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020.
